frameset.edef: to take over or get everything

example.parse: (S (NP-SBJ (PRON_1P اِحْنا)) (PRN (S (VP (NEG_PART ما) (PP-PRD (PREP فِي) (NP (PRON_3MS ه)) (PRT (NEG_PART ش))) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG فايْدَة))))) (SBAR-NOM-PRD (WHNP-3 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (ADJ.VN+NSUFF_MASC_PL عاوْزِين) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (SBAR (-NONE- 0) (S (VP (IV1P+IV نِكوش) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP عَلَى) (NP (DET+NOUN الدِنْيا) (CONJ وِ) (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG الآَخِرَة))))))))))

arg.g: on this world and the hereafter
